title: The Buccaneers Season 2 Premiere: Leighton Meester Makes Dramatic Entrance as [Spoiler]’s Mother
description: Leighton Meester may have traded in her Upper East Side pearls for The Buccaneers’ English corsets, but the girl’s gossiping days are far from over. Season 2 of the Apple TV+ drama premiered on Wednesday, picking up right where we left off: Nan’s wedding day. In case you need a refresher, Season 1 ended with […]
author: Claire Franken

title: R.I.P., Anne Burrell: Rachael Ray and More Food Network Stars Pay Tribute (‘She Was a Radiant Spirit’)
description: The Food Network family is honoring one of their own. TV chef Anne Burrell, a staple on Food Network with shows like Worst Cooks in America and Chopped, died on Tuesday at the age of 55, and her culinary colleagues have been paying tribute to her legacy on social media. Talk show host and cookbook […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
